event.description: Felipe Lopez flies out to left fielder Manny Ramirez.
Chris Young strikes out swinging.
Conor Jackson doubles (3) on a ground ball to left fielder Manny Ramirez.
Mark Reynolds grounds out, third baseman Casey Blake to first baseman James Loney.
Justin Upton walks.
Eric Byrnes grounds into a force out, pitcher Eric Stults to second baseman Orlando Hudson to shortstop Rafael Furcal. Justin Upton out at 2nd. Eric Byrnes to 1st.
Chris Snyder singles on a ground ball to left fielder Manny Ramirez. Eric Byrnes to 3rd.
Josh Wilson singles on a ground ball to left fielder Manny Ramirez. Eric Byrnes scores. Chris Snyder to 2nd.
Doug Davis ground bunts into a double play, catcher Russell Martin to third baseman Casey Blake to second baseman Orlando Hudson. Chris Snyder out at 3rd.
Felipe Lopez hit by pitch.
Chris Young pops out to first baseman James Loney in foul territory.

Ryan Roberts strikes out swinging.
